summary.span: 定义用于绘制直线和曲线的对象。

span.span: Defines an object used to draw lines and curves.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个绘制指定的宽度和样式的行。A draws a line of specified width and style. 使用属性要绘制的虚线的几种变体。Use the property to draw several varieties of dashed lines. 绘制的线条可以使用多种填充样式，包括纯色和纹理填充。The line drawn by a can be filled in a variety of fill styles, including solid colors and textures. 填充样式取决于画笔或纹理用作填充对象。The fill style depends on brush or texture that is used as the fill object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造与和设置的效果属性。The following code example demonstrates constructing a with a and the effects of setting the property on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowLineJoin`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定如何绘制线条。The property determines how the draws lines. 绘制连线，就好像它们是填充的矩形，具有指定特征。Lines are drawn as if they are filled rectangles, with the characteristics of the specified . 属性的新设置为 1 （默认值）。The property of the new is set to 1 (the default). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造与和设置的效果属性。The following code example demonstrates constructing a with a and the effects of setting the property on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowLineJoin`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为在指定的颜色`brush`参数，属性设置中指定的值为`width`参数和单位设置为。The is set to the color specified in the `brush` parameter, the property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter, and the units are set to . 请注意，`brush`参数还指定属性的。Note that the `brush` parameter also specifies the property of this . 一个`width`为 0 将导致绘图效果呈现为宽度为 1。A `width` of 0 will result in the drawing as if the width were 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建，并演示设置的效果并上的属性。The following code example creates a and demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowStartAndEndCaps`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowStartAndEndCaps` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为指定的颜色`color`参数。The property is set to the color specified by the `color` parameter. 属性设置中指定的值为`width`参数。The property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter. 一个`width`为 0 将导致绘图效果呈现为宽度为 1。A `width` of 0 will result in the drawing as if the width were 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和设置的效果， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates creating a and the effects of setting the , , and properties. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递 e 作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing e as . MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Drawing2D::PenAlignment Alignment { System::Drawing::Drawing2D::PenAlignment get(); void set(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::PenAlignment value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment for this .

value.span: 表示该 的对齐方式的 。

span.span: A that represents the alignment for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定如何绘制闭合的曲线和多边形。This property determines how the draws closed curves and polygons. 枚举指定五个值; 但是，只有两个值 —和— 将更改绘制的线条的外观。The enumeration specifies five values; however, only two values— and —will change the appearance of a drawn line. 是此属性的默认值，指定笔的宽度曲线或多边形的轮廓上居中。 is the default value for this property and specifies that the width of the pen is centered on the outline of the curve or polygon. 值为为此属性指定的轮廓的曲线或多边形的内部为笔的宽度。A value of for this property specifies that the width of the pen is inside the outline of the curve or polygon. 其他三个值， ， ，和，将导致居中的笔。The other three values, , , and , will result in a pen that is centered. 一个已设置为其对齐会产生不可靠的结果，有时会绘制在内嵌位置，有时中居中的位置。A that has its alignment set to will yield unreliable results, sometimes drawing in the inset position and sometimes in the centered position. 此外，内嵌钢笔不能用于绘制复合线，并且不能绘制的虚线线帽。Also, an inset pen cannot be used to draw compound lines and cannot draw dashed lines with dash caps.

exception.span: 指定值不是 的成员。

span.span: The specified value is not a member of .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 创建一份该笔。Creates a copy of that pen. - 将一条线绘制到屏幕上，使用笔的副本。Draws a line to the screen, using the copy of the pen. MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <float> ^ CompoundArray { cli::array <float> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <float> ^ value); };
member this.CompoundArray : single[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于指定复合钢笔的值数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of values that specifies a compound pen.

summary.span: 复合钢笔绘制由平行直线和空白区域组成的复合直线。

span.span: A compound pen draws a compound line made up of parallel lines and spaces.

value.span: 用于指定复合数组的实数组。

span.span: An array of real numbers that specifies the compound array.

value.span: 该数组中的元素必须按升序排列，不能小于 0，也不能大于 1。

span.span: The elements in the array must be in increasing order, not less than 0, and not greater than 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复合线是组成交替平行直线和空白区域的不同的宽度。A compound line is made up of alternating parallel lines and spaces of varying widths. 数组中的值指定复合线相对于笔的宽度的每个组件的起始点。The values in the array specify the starting points of each component of the compound line relative to the pen's width. 数组中的第一个值指定的第一个组件 （行） 的开始位置的距离分数在笔的宽度范围内。The first value in the array specifies where the first component (a line) begins as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen. 数组中的第二个值在笔的宽度范围内为距离的一小部分指定下一个组件 （空格） 的开头。The second value in the array specifies the beginning of the next component (a space) as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen. 数组中的最终值指定的最后一个组件中的结束位置。The final value in the array specifies where the last component ends. 假设你想用钢笔绘制两条平行线表示其中的第一行的宽度是钢笔的宽度的 20%，宽度空格分隔的两行是 50%的笔 ' s 宽度和第二行的宽度为 30%的钢笔的宽度。Suppose you want a pen to draw two parallel lines where the width of the first line is 20 percent of the pen's width, the width of the space that separates the two lines is 50 percent of the pen' s width, and the width of the second line is 30 percent of the pen's width. 首先创建和的实数数组。Start by creating a and an array of real numbers. 通过将数组的值介于 0.0、 0.2、 0.7，到 1.0，该数组传递给此属性设置复合数组。Set the compound array by passing the array with the values 0.0, 0.2, 0.7, and 1.0 to this property. 如果未设置此属性具有其属性设置为。Do not set this property if the has its property set to .

exception.span: 对不可变的 （比如由 类所返回）设置 属性。

span.span: The property is set on an immutable , such as those returned by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未设置此属性为如果具有其属性设置为。Do not set this property to if the has its property set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和设置的效果， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates creating a and the effects of setting the , , and properties. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . summary.span: 获取或设置自定义的短划线和空白区域的数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of custom dashes and spaces.

value.span: 实数数组，指定虚线中交替出现的短划线和空白区域的长度。

span.span: An array of real numbers that specifies the lengths of alternating dashes and spaces in dashed lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不赋值`null`为此属性将设置此属性到。Assigning a value other than `null` to this property will set the property for this to . 中的元素`dashArray`数组在短划线图案中设置每个短划线和空格的长度。The elements in the `dashArray` array set the length of each dash and space in the dash pattern. 第一个元素设置的短划线的长度，第二个元素设置的空间的长度，第三个元素设置短划线和等等的长度。The first element sets the length of a dash, the second element sets the length of a space, the third element sets the length of a dash, and so on. 因此，每个元素应为非零的正数。Consequently, each element should be a non-zero positive number. 每个短划线和短划线图案中的空间的长度是数组中的元素值的产品和宽度的。The length of each dash and space in the dash pattern is the product of the element value in the array and the width of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的效果， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the , , and properties. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为为此属性指定定义的短划线和空格，自定义模式属性，构成与此绘制线条。A value of for this property specifies that a custom pattern of dashes and spaces, defined by the property, makes up lines drawn with this . 如果此属性的值是和值属性是`null`，笔绘制实线。If the value of this property is and the value of the property is `null`, the pen draws solid lines.

summary.span: 释放此 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用允许使用的资源重新分配用于其他目的。Calling allows the resources used by this to be reallocated for other purposes. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的效果并属性，并演示如何调用方法。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties, and shows how to call the method for a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowLineJoin`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在垃圾回收将某一对象回收前允许该对象尝试释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Drawing2D::LineJoin LineJoin { System::Drawing::Drawing2D::LineJoin get(); void set(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::LineJoin value); };
member this.LineJoin : System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置通过此 绘制的两条连续直线的端点的联接样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this .

value.span: 一个 ，表示通过此 绘制的两条连续直线的端点的联接样式。

span.span: A that represents the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 线条联接是由两个线条的端点相交或重叠的常见区域。A line join is the common area that is formed by two lines whose ends meet or overlap. 有三个行联接样式： 斜接、 凹凸效果，和舍入。There are three line join styles: miter, bevel, and round. 当指定为线段联接样式对象，联接样式，将应用于任何中所有连接的直线使用该笔绘制的对象。下图显示斜切的线条联接示例的结果。When you specify a line join style for a object, that join style will be applied to all the connected lines in any object drawn using that pen.The following illustration shows the results of the beveled line join example. ![笔](~/add/media/pens5.gif "笔")![Pens](~/add/media/pens5.gif "Pens") ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的效果并上的属性。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowLineJoin`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 对不可变的 （比如由 类所返回）设置 属性。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float MiterLimit { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.MiterLimit : single with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置斜接角上联接宽度的限制。

span.span: Gets or sets the limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.

value.span: 斜接角上联接宽度的限制。

span.span: The limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 斜接长度是联接的外部联接的行墙的交集的内侧的行墙的交集的距离。The miter length is the distance from the intersection of the line walls on the inside of the join to the intersection of the line walls outside of the join. 当两行之间的角度较少时，斜接长度可能很大。The miter length can be large when the angle between two lines is small. 斜联接限制。 斜接长度与笔划宽度的最大允许的比率The miter limit is the maximum allowed ratio of miter length to stroke width. 默认值为 10.0 f。The default value is 10.0f. 联接的交集的斜接长度超出了联接的限制，然后将斜联接来将其保持在联接的交集的限制。If the miter length of the join of the intersection exceeds the limit of the join, then the join will be beveled to keep it within the limit of the join of the intersection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法预先计算中指定的乘法矩阵`matrix`乘法运算的转换矩阵的参数。This method prepends the multiplication matrix specified in the `matrix` parameter to the transformation matrix for the multiplication operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 在屏幕上绘制直线。Draws a line to the screen. - 返回由指定的矩阵笔的转换矩阵的乘积。Multiplies the transformation matrix of the pen by the specified matrix. - 使用转换后的笔绘制直线。Draws a line with the transformed pen. span.span: This method prepends the rotation to the transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为笔的形状为圆形，旋转没有任何明显的效果，除非在 x 轴或 y 轴方向缩放笔。Because the shape of a pen is circular, a rotation does not have any visible effect unless the pen is scaled in the x- or y-axis direction. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 绘制一个矩形使用笔。Draws a rectangle using the pen. - 在 x 轴方向的 2 倍缩放笔。Scales the pen by 2 times in the x-axis direction. - 将笔旋转 90 度顺时针旋转。Rotates the pen 90 degrees clockwise. - 绘制要演示的差异的第二个矩形。Draws a second rectangle to demonstrate the difference. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码会创建并将其绘制箭头锚定帽的直线起点设置：The code creates a and sets it to draw arrow anchor caps at the beginning of lines: [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的效果并上的属性。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowStartAndEndCaps`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowStartAndEndCaps` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the geometric transformation for this .

value.span: 一个 副本，表示此 的几何变换。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义笔尖的椭圆形状。This property defines an elliptical shape for the pen tip. 从默认循环形状，该椭圆被获取的应用转换矩阵。This ellipse is obtained from the default circular shape by applying the transformation matrix. 请注意，在矩阵的平移部分将被忽略。Note that the translation portion of the matrix is ignored. 因为返回的矩阵和通过属性为钢笔的几何转换的副本，在不再需要时应释放的矩阵。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the pen's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以访问的度量单位对象使用其属性。You can access the unit of measure of the object using its property. 通常，度量值的单位为像素。The unit of measure is typically pixels. 一个为 0 将导致绘图像是 1。A of 0 will result in the drawing as if the were 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的效果并上的属性。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties on a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowLineJoin`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as .
